author: Special Correspondent
text:
The police have announced that temporary bus stands would be created in view of the Pongal festival to ease congestion here.

They would come up near the Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation bus depot close to Sona Mina theatre, Old Illupur Road at Mannapuram and at Madurai service road at Mannarpuram. They would function from January 12 to 18.

All Thanjavur route buses would be operated from the temporary bus stand close to Sona Mina theatre while Pudukottai route buses would ply from Old Illupur Road at Mannarpuram. Madurai route buses would be operated from the Madurai service road at Mannarpuram.

Buses proceeding to other cities and towns would be operated as usual from the central bus stand, a press release here said. Arrangements would be made to operate shuttle services from the central bus stand to the temporary bus stands at Mannarpuram and back through the TNSTC.

Basic facilities such as temporary passenger shelters, drinking water and toilet facilities would be provided.
title: Pongal: temporary bus stands coming up in Tiruchi
